descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Temple of Mephala
Author: Edhildil
6,8,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This Mod adds a Temple dedicated to Mephala. It is located southwest of Whiterun somewhat close to Western Tower. Features include:

4 NPCs, one is a merchant (potions).
A two handed enchanted sword.
An awesome statue.
A shrine (stealth).

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

Not so far, but one of the NPC's is supposed to be a trainer but I couldn't get it to work?.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Skyrim
Â 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.




[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]


Edhildil for the statue
Sevenity for sevenbase body

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
